DISCORD_TOKEN.description: Discord bot token(ボットのトークン)

CHANNEL_ID.description: ID of the channel to translate(int)(翻訳するチャンネルのID(整数))

CHANNEL_URL.description: Webhook URL of the channel to translate(翻訳するチャンネルのWebhookのURL)

HOME_LANG.description: Any language can be translated into this language(メインの言語)

HOME_TO_LANG.description: Language to be translated when using 'HOME_LANG'(HOME_LANGの時の翻訳先言語)

GAS_URL.description: When using Google Apps Script translation, use the URL(GASでデプロイした翻訳を使うときはURLを入力)

IGNORE_ID.description: If there is a user you want to ignore, enter the ID(int) separated by a colon(無視ユーザーのID(数字)を':'区切りで入力
